Class UserAuthenticationByPincodeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
me.julb.applications.authorizationserver.services.impl.UserAuthenticationByPincodeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserAuthenticationByPincodeService
@Service @Validated @Transactional(readOnly=true, propagation=SUPPORTS) public class UserAuthenticationByPincodeServiceImpl extends Object implements UserAuthenticationByPincodeService
The user authentication by pincode service implementation.
